[[File:DawnStone.png|thumb|200px|The Dawn Stone]]
==Details==
===Description=== The Dawn Stone costs 2,500 [[Quest Points]]. It can be bought from the [[shops]] of [[Shops#Sinnoh:_Locations_and_items|Solaceon Town]] in [[Sinnoh]].
===Uses=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Pre-Evolution !! Evolution |- | Kirlia || | Gallade |- | Snorunt || | Froslass |}
[[Category:Items]] [[Category:Evolution Items]]

[[File:DawnStone.png|thumb|200px|The Dawn Stone]]
==Details==
===Description=== The Dawn Stone costs 2,500 [[Quest Points]]. It can be bought from the [[shops]] of [[Shops#Sinnoh:_Locations_and_items|Solaceon Town]] in [[Sinnoh]]. It can also be mined from the [[Underground]].
===Uses=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Pre-Evolution !! Evolution |- | Kirlia || | Gallade |- | Snorunt || | Froslass |}
[[Category:Items]] [[Category:Evolution Items]]
